original_title: Voices of Our Time - Ian Bostridge
overview: Bostridge sings songs by Franz Schubert and Hugo Wolf with pianist Roger Vignoles at the Theatre du Chatelet in Paris in 2000. DVD features include subtitles in English, German, French, Italian, and Spanish, and 5.0 DTS, 5.0 DD, and LPCM stereo.
title: Voices of Our Time - Ian Bostridge
